Brain Lord

18 HP, 14 STR, 14 DEX, 20 CHA, immunity to mind-altering spells

• Its psychic ability allows it to levitate, project itself to other realities, and telepathically issue any command. If the target refuses to obey the command, they must succeed on a CHA save or lose d8 CHA.

• Mind Blast: attacks the target's mind with psychic energy for d8 Damage. Critical Damage from this attack affects CHA instead of STR and is avoided by a CHA save.

• Critical Damage in melee: a target has its brain extracted and eaten. The Brain Lord absorbs its recent memories.

category: monsters source: itdr
